TopicTitle: How do I get into bop's SOI?

Articles.Content: Hey guys I'm wondering how to get into bops SOI. It seems really small. And I can't find the correct way to point and where to burn to get our orbits the same.

Try to angle your orbit so its matching bops, and thrust until your trajectory reaches it, hopefully I worded that right Maybe you can try quicksaving each time, so if you make a really close pass, but your not in it, your can just reload and try to fix your orbit
